import React, { useState } from 'react' import { NavLink, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import logo from "../assets/images/logoblanc.png" import logo2 from "../assets/images/logobleu.png" import "../assets/css/navbar.css" import MenuTwoToneIcon from '@material-ui/icons/MenuTwoTone'; import HighlightOffIcon from '@material-ui/icons/HighlightOff'; import profile from "../assets/images/profile.png" import profile2 from "../assets/images/profile2.png" import Chiffre from './Chiffre' export default function Navbar() { const [moved, setMoved] = useState(false) const [click, setClick] = React.useState(false); const handleClick = () => setClick(!click); const Close = () => setClick(false); window.addEventListener('scroll', function (e) { if (window.scrollY > 0) { setMoved(true) } else { setMoved(false) } }) return (
Close()} />
e.stopPropagation()}>
